ARABIC: وَأَمَّآ إِن كَانَ مِنْ أَصْحَٰبِ ٱلْيَمِينِ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: And if he is one of the Companions of the Right,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: If he is of those of the right hand,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: And if he is one of the People on the Right,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: If it is of the people of the right hand,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: And if he is of those on the right, –
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: And if he be of those on the right,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: And if he is one of those on the right hand,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: and if he be a Companion of the Right:
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: And if he is of those on the right hand,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: and if he is of those who are on the Right,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: And if he be of the fellows on the right hand,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: And if he be of the People of the Right Hand,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: And if he be of the Companions of the Right Hand,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: And if he (the dying person) be of those on the Right Hand,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: If he is a Companion of the Right
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: And if he is one of those on the Right.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: And if he was of the companions of the right,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [56:90] And if he be of those of the right [hand],
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (And if he is of those on the right hand) of the inhabitants of Paradise, and all of them are,
